protocol.name: P-GSE42841-1
protocol.text: Microarray datasets (.CEL files) were normalized by R package RMA and exported as Excel files ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 GC-RMA signal

protocol.name: P-GSE42841-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown in soil for about 5-6 weeks until unopened flower buds were collected.

protocol.name: P-GSE42841-3
protocol.text: Ler and ask1 flower bud total RNA was extracted using the NucleoSpin® RNA Plant kit (MACHEREY-NAGEL).

protocol.name: P-GSE42841-4
protocol.text: Samples were enzymatically fragmented and biotinylated using the WT Terminal Labeling Kit (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE42841-5
protocol.text: Prepare hybridization cocktail using the GeneChip Hybridization Wash and Stain Kit (#702232) and hybridize arrays according to the manufacturer’s instructions in the Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization Oven 640.
